column1: Smoque BBQ////Wasn't able to try Smoque last time I was in Chicago
column2: so I had to make sure I came this time around. Went during lunch with 3 friends. Ordered the rib combo platter (6 St. Louis and 6 baby backs)
column9: brisket chili and an extra coleslaw. Regretted ordering the extra coleslaw because each platter actually comes with a side already
column10: so we ended up with 3 coleslaws. Also tried both the Memphis and Carolina BBQ sauce. Both different in their own way.
